name: Slide! (Not The Loading Screen)
description:
Slide! Is a puzzle game where you control happy boy and have to defeat your arch-enemy Angry man. The Game features 13 Levels, each harder than the last and was made for the Game Jaaj 7 gamejam.

HTML VERSION MAY HAVE SLIGHTLY LOWER GRAPHICAL EFFECTS.


Credits:

Fenekito - Coding, Level Design, Soundtrack

Dogoso - Coding, Level Design, Sound Effects, Sprites

Gya - Sprites, Artwork

Trunhan - Sprite

NTLS WOULD ALSO LIKE TO THANK!

Halley Labs Resource Center - Samples

André Young - Game Jaaj 7

Timeless - Testing and Feedback
